channel.title: The _^_ appreciation thread
channel.description:
Let all of his admirers gather and glaze in wonder. [size=14pt]A little piece of triangle![/size]
<_^_> i have got a question for you <_^_> if you were to design a hardware device to generate random bytes <_^_> how would you do it, how much would it cost, and how many bytes/second could you generate ?
<_^_> ok cbot <_^_> i will tell you <_^_> that my doing with random number generation <_^_> is rapidly converging <_^_> on ideas lol <_^_> Pure_ what about you <_^_> what are you thinking about ? lol <_^_> oh <_^_> Pure_ <_^_> you have my sincerest condolences
<_^_> do you know how to get php mail() to work ?
<_^_> what is your <_^_> projected expected time <_^_> of locating it ?
<_^_> now treesuqsbawlz <_^_> i was debating this with Pure earlier <_^_> but <_^_> when there is an incumbent queen but no incumbent king <_^_> should it not be referred to as the "united queendom" ?
<_^_> my mothers cousins 12 and a half year old daughter knows more about cars than i do
look what i saw today https://scontent-b-mia.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpf1/t1.0-9/10550866_10152160281850598_8206602415062981322_n.jpg <_^_> caseyctrl: what is that picture ? what the fudge do you think <_^_> it is a picture of light refracting off of cars no <_^_> but is it interesting because of the refraction <_^_> or the cars <_^_> oh it might be the $2million dollar car pictured i dunno <_^_> you know <_^_> my mothers cousins 12 and a half year old daughter knows more about cars than i do
<_^_> caseyctrl where were you when the planes hit
lawl: _^_ is a maker of BAD MUSIC
[hr] [size=14pt]More triangle![/size] [ul][li][iurl=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663881.msg4437410.html#msg4437410]The chaos theory and retaliation.[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663881.msg4437513.html#msg4437513]'Destination' - it's payback time.[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663881.msg4437600.html#msg4437600]Drub will be doxed.[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663881.msg4439215.html#msg4439215]Name completion, child prawnsography and RIP _^_ (22/07/2014).[/iurl][/li][/ul]

item.title: The _^_ appreciation thread
item.dc:creator: @Sapphirus Sapphirus
item.description:
@Sapphirus wrote:

17:26 I love how canada & mexico are being so friendly to each other whereas the us wants a wall 17:26 lolol 17:26 maybe it's time for trump to campaign for two walls 17:27 mexicans don't require visas to enter canada any longer 17:27 <_^_> canada and mexico are able to be friendly with each other because they are not next to eachother 17:27 <_^_> "familiarity breeds contempt" - _^_
18:00 <_^_> the people in this country are desperate to stop us from being taken advantage of by literally the whole world 18:02 <_^_> tets 18:02 says the country that takes advantage of the whole world 18:02 <_^_> jme that right now is literally the only way to keep up 18:02 <_^_> with how much they are doing it to us 18:02 <_^_> i need to restart the internet brb 18:03 <_^_> hello 18:05 hi 18:05 why is ur internet so shit 18:05 <_^_> no it was google 18:05 <_^_> google did that thing where the top row of tabs froze 18:05 <_^_> you can click on them and change tabs 18:05 <_^_> but the ui does not at all update 18:06 <&tL> i cant believe u still use shitty web clients after all this time 18:06 <&tL> specifically mibbit 18:06 <_^_> tL i am very worried that the government might have hacked into mibbit for the purpose of reading my IRC conversations 18:06 <&tL> so stop using mibbit then -.- 18:06 <_^_> i am trying to find a way to download mibbit onto my computer 18:07 <_^_> tL but i oppose change ..
18:25 <_^_> "mr. snail" 18:25 <_^_> what is that supposed to mean 18:26 guys, batten down the hatches, we're dealing with a legit case of autism. 18:26 <_^_> you are so new here it is not even funny

Read full topic
